Name: Fig Supreme
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Scoop out the flesh of figs and MUDDLE in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Fig and pomegranate add an extra dimension to this Margarita-style cocktail.
History: Created by Salvatore Calabrese at Salvatore At Fifty bar in London, England and originally served in an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. This cocktail features in Salvatore's 2015 Classic Cocktails book.
